final_answer: The image is satirical because it highlights a contradiction between the two panels. On the left, Bob advocates for free speech as a civil right with an empowering image and hashtags promoting freedom of speech. However, the right panel humorously reveals that Bob has blocked 1273 people from commenting on his posts, including specific names shown in the list. This contrast and irony suggest that despite his public support for free speech, he censors others, undermining his own message and creating a humorous inconsistency.
